required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study of HRS8807 Monotherapy and in Combination With SHR6390 in Subjects With ER-Positive, HER2-Negative Metastatic or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Single Arm, Open-Label, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetic of HRS8807 Monotherapy and in Combination With SHR6390 in Subjects With ER-Positive, HER2-Negative Metastatic or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The study is to assess safety and tolerability of HRS8807 monotherapy and in combination with SHR6390 in subjects with metastatic or locally advanced breast cancer in order to estimate the Dose-Limiting Toxicity (DLT), Maximum Tolerated Dose (MTD) and select the Recommended Phase 2 Dose (RP2D).

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: HRS8807 monotherapy and in combination with SHR6390

primary_outcome.description: Maximum Tolerated Dose (MTD) of HRS8807 monotherapy and in combination with SHR6390
select the Recommended Phase 2 Dose (RP2D) of HRS8807 monotherapy and in combination with SHR6390

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 30 days after end of treatment
primary_outcome.description: AEs and SAEs as characterized by frequency and severity (as graded by National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events [NCI CTCAE version 5.0]).
